code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import{createStyles,makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import EditorContext from"contexts/editorContext";import TextareaAutosize from"@material-ui/core/TextareaAutosize";import{FieldType}from"./Fields";import EditorModel from"./EditorModal";var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return createStyles({test:{position:"absolute",top:10,left:10},modal:{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",maxWidth:600,width:"100%"},paper:{padding:theme.spacing(2)},root:{position:"relative",display:"flex",flexWrap:"wrap"},typography:{padding:theme.spacing(2)},textArea:{fontSize:16,minWidth:230,width:"100%"}});});var LongTextEditor=function LongTextEditor(props){var classes=useStyles();var editorContext=useContext(EditorContext);if(editorContext.fieldType!==FieldType.longText)return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null);return React.createElement(EditorModel,null,React.createElement(TextareaAutosize,{id:"TextareaAutosize",className:classes.textArea,rowsMax:25,"aria-label":"maximum height",placeholder:"enter text",defaultValue:editorContext.editorValue,autoFocus:true,onChange:function onChange(e){editorContext.setEditorValue(e.target.value);}}));};export default LongTextEditor;
